TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit JulianCalendar extends System.Globalization.Calendar

summary.span: 代表凱撒曆法。

span.span: Represents the Julian calendar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 45 西元前凱撒大帝排序日曆修訂，後者稱為凱撒曆法的曆法。In 45 B.C., Julius Caesar ordered a calendar reform, which resulted in the calendar called the Julian calendar. 凱撒曆法為西曆的前置項。The Julian calendar is the predecessor of the Gregorian calendar. > [!NOTE] > 如需使用類別和其他的行事曆 .NET Framework 中的類別，請參閱[使用行事曆](~/docs/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars.md)。For information about using the class and the other calendar classes in the .NET Framework, see [Working with Calendars](~/docs/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars.md). 類別會辨識目前的紀元。The class recognizes only the current era. 不同於西曆中，凱撒曆法會定義整除由四個不含例外的年份為閏年。Unlike the Gregorian calendar, the Julian calendar defines a leap year as a year that is evenly divisible by four with no exceptions. 因此，行事曆一天每隔 128 年是不正確。Therefore, the calendar is inaccurate by one day every 128 years. 一般年份有 365 天，閏年有 366 天。A common year has 365 days and a leap year has 366 days. 如同西曆凱撒曆法具有各有 28 到 31 天的 12 個月： 年 1 月 （31 天）、 2 (28 或 29 天)、 年 3 月 （31 天）、 年 4 月 （30 天），可能 （31 天）、 年 6 月 （30 天）、 年 7 月 （31 天）、 年 8 月 （31 天）、 年 9 月 （30 天）、 年 10 月 （31 天）年 11 月 （30 天） 和年 12 月 （31 天）。Like the Gregorian calendar, the Julian calendar has 12 months with 28 to 31 days each: January (31 days), February (28 or 29 days), March (31 days), April (30 days), May (31 days), June (30 days), July (31 days), August (31 days), September (30 days), October (31 days), November (30 days), and December (31 days). 二月有 29 天，閏年和 28。February has 29 days during leap years and 28 during common years. 日期年 1 月 1，2001 A.D.。The date January 1, 2001 A.D. 在西曆相當於西元 2000 年 12 月 19 日in the Gregorian calendar is equivalent to the 19th day of December in the year 2000 A.D. 即可使用凱撒曆法。in the Julian calendar. 目前，不是由任何支援的文化特性類別。Currently, the is not used by any of the cultures supported by the class. 因此，類別可以用僅以計算凱撒曆法的日期。Therefore, the class can be used only to calculate dates in the Julian calendar. 每個物件支援一組的行事曆。Each object supports a set of calendars. 屬性會傳回預設的行事曆文化特性，而屬性會傳回陣列，其中包含所有支援的文化特性的行事曆。The property returns the default calendar for the culture, and the property returns an array containing all the calendars supported by the culture. 若要變更所使用的行事曆，應用程式應該設定屬性至新。To change the calendar used by a , the application should set the property of to a new .

span.span: The to which to add months.
The number of months to add.

summary.span: 傳回與指定 相差指定月數的 。

span.span: Returns a that is the specified number of months away from the specified .

returns.span: ，由將指定的月數加入指定的 所產生。

span.span: The that results from adding the specified number of months to the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 產生的日期部分如果產生的日期不是有效的日期，產生結果年的月份中會受到影響。The day part of the resulting is affected if the resulting day is not a valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 它會變更為有效的最後一天，在產生的產生的年份。It is changed to the last valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 產生的年份部分如果產生的月份超出指定的年份，會影響。The year part of the resulting is affected if the resulting month is outside the year of the specified . 這項實作支援目前的紀元。This implementation supports only the current era. 因此，如果產生的年份超出指定紀元，會擲回。Therefore, is thrown if the resulting year is outside the era of the specified . 產生的日期時間部分維持不變，與指定。The time-of-day part of the resulting remains the same as the specified . 比方說，如果指定的月份是 10 月 31 天內，其指定的日期，而且該月第 31 天的值`months`參數為 6，產生的年份是其中一個以上的指定年份中，產生的月份是年 4 月，並產生 day 是第 30 天、 4 月的最後一天。For example, if the specified month is October, which has 31 days, the specified day is the 31st day of that month, and the value of the `months` parameter is 6, the resulting year is one more than the specified year, the resulting month is April, and the resulting day is the 30th day, which is the last day in April. 如果值`months`參數是負值，產生早於指定。If the value of the `months` parameter is negative, the resulting is earlier than the specified . 屬性傳回之值一律等於。The property of the returned value always equals . 您可以保留屬性`time`藉由呼叫參數方法，如下列範例所示。You can preserve the property of the `time` parameter by calling the method, as the following example shows. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/cs/add1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/vb/add1.vb#5)] ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示的數個元件的值方面凱撒曆法。The following code example displays the values of several components of a in terms of the Julian calendar. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.JulianCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.JulianCalendar_AddGet/CPP/juliancalendar_addget.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.JulianCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.JulianCalendar_AddGet/CS/juliancalendar_addget.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.JulianCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.JulianCalendar_AddGet/VB/juliancalendar_addget.vb#1)]

is less than -120000.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 產生的日期部分如果產生的日期不是有效的日期，產生結果年的月份中會受到影響。The day part of the resulting is affected if the resulting day is not a valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 它會變更為有效的最後一天，在產生的產生的年份。It is changed to the last valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 產生的月份部分維持不變，與指定。The month part of the resulting remains the same as the specified . 這項實作支援目前的紀元。This implementation supports only the current era. 因此，如果產生的年份超出指定紀元，會擲回。Therefore, is thrown if the resulting year is outside the era of the specified . 產生的日期時間部分維持不變，與指定。The time-of-day part of the resulting remains the same as the specified . 例如，二月有 28 天，除了閏年時有 29 天期間。For example, February has 28 days, except during leap years when it has 29 days. 如果指定的日期是潤年 2 月 29 日值`years`為 1，則產生的日期是一年中的 2 月 28 日。If the specified date is the 29th day of February in a leap year and the value of `years` is 1, the resulting date is the 28th day of February in the following year. 如果`years`是負數，產生早於指定。If `years` is negative, the resulting is earlier than the specified . 屬性傳回之值一律等於。The property of the returned value always equals . 您可以保留屬性`time`藉由呼叫參數方法，如下列範例所示。You can preserve the property of the `time` parameter by calling the method, as the following example shows. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/cs/add1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/vb/add1.vb#8)] ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示的數個元件的值方面凱撒曆法。The following code example displays the values of several components of a in terms of the Julian calendar. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.JulianCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.JulianCalendar_AddGet/CPP/juliancalendar_addget.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.JulianCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.JulianCalendar_AddGet/CS/juliancalendar_addget.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.JulianCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.JulianCalendar_AddGet/VB/juliancalendar_addget.vb#1)]

span.span: An integer from 1 to 366 that represents the day of the year in .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 年份的日期被定義為一年的第一天中的天數。The day of the year is defined as the number of days from the first day of the year. 例如，的第一個月的第一天，則傳回 1，和日期在過去一個月，最後該年份中傳回總天數。For example, for the first day of the first month returns 1, and for the last day of the last month returns the total number of days in that year. 總計是相同的值傳回。The total is the same value as that returned by . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示的數個元件的值方面凱撒曆法。The following code example displays the values of several components of a in terms of the Julian calendar. MemberSignature.Value: public override int GetLeapMonth (int year, int era);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 GetLeapMonth(int32 year, int32 era) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetLeapMonth (year As Integer, era As Integer) As Integer
public: override int GetLeapMonth(int year, int era);

span.span: An integer that represents the year.
An integer that represents the era.

summary.span: 計算指定年份和紀元的閏月。

span.span: Calculates the leap month for a specified year and era.

returns.span: 正整數，指出在指定的年份及紀元中的閏月。

span.span: A positive integer that indicates the leap month in the specified year and era.

returns.span: 如果曆法不支援閏月，或 和 未指定閏年，則這個方法也會傳回零。

span.span: Alternatively, this method returns zero if the calendar does not support a leap month, or if and do not specify a leap year.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 曆法，支援閏月的概念，在特定月份或任何一年中月份之後發生的閏月。In a calendar that supports the notion of a leap month, the leap month can occur either after a particular month or after any month in a year. 例如，方法傳回的數字，介於 1 到 13，表示相關聯的指定日期的月份。For example, the method returns a number between 1 and 13 that indicates the month associated with a specified date. 如果年份的第八個和第九個月之間沒有閏月方法會傳回 8 閏第八個月的 9 和 10 的第九個月份的第八個月份。If there is a leap month between the eighth and ninth months of the year, the method returns 8 for the eighth month, 9 for the leap eighth month, and 10 for the ninth month.

span.span: An integer that represents the year.

summary.span: 判斷指定紀元中指定的日期是否為閏日。

span.span: Determines whether the specified date in the specified era is a leap day.

returns.span: 如果指定的日期為閏日，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the specified day is a leap day; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不同於西曆中，凱撒曆法會定義整除由四個不含例外的年份為閏年。Unlike the Gregorian calendar, the Julian calendar defines a leap year as a year that is evenly divisible by four with no exceptions. 因此，行事曆一天每隔 128 年是不正確。Therefore, the calendar is inaccurate by one day every 128 years. 例如，1999 年不為閏年，但 2000 年。For example, the year 1999 was not a leap year, but the year 2000 was. 一般年份有 365 天，閏年有 366 天。A common year has 365 days and a leap year has 366 days. 為閏日是閏年只會發生一天。A leap day is a day that occurs only in a leap year. 即可使用凱撒曆法，2 月 29 日是唯一的閏日。In the Julian calendar, the 29th day of February is the only leap day. ## Examples 下列範例會呼叫的第二個月 （二月） 五年的每個紀元的最後一天。The following example calls for the last day of the second month (February) for five years in each of the eras. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.JulianCalendar.IsLeapDay#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.JulianCalendar.IsLeapDay/CPP/juliancalendar_isleapday.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.JulianCalendar.IsLeapDay#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.JulianCalendar.IsLeapDay/CS/juliancalendar_isleapday.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.JulianCalendar.IsLeapDay#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.JulianCalendar.IsLeapDay/VB/juliancalendar_isleapday.vb#1)]

span.span: This method always returns , unless overridden by a derived class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不同於西曆中，凱撒曆法會定義整除由四個不含例外的年份為閏年。Unlike the Gregorian calendar, the Julian calendar defines a leap year as a year that is evenly divisible by four with no exceptions. 因此，行事曆一天每隔 128 年是不正確。Therefore, the calendar is inaccurate by one day every 128 years. 例如，1999 年不為閏年，但 2000 年。For example, the year 1999 was not a leap year, but the year 2000 was. 一般年份有 365 天，閏年有 366 天。A common year has 365 days and a leap year has 366 days. 為閏月是只發生在閏年整個月。A leap month is an entire month that occurs only in a leap year. 凱撒曆法並沒有任何閏月。The Julian calendar does not have any leap months. ## Examples 下列範例會呼叫目前紀元中的五年中的所有月份。The following example calls for all the months in five years in the current era. MemberSignature.Value: public override int ToFourDigitYear (int year);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 ToFourDigitYear(int32 year) cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToFourDigitYear (year As Integer) As Integer
public: override int ToFourDigitYear(int year);

param.name: year
param.span: 兩位數或四位數整數，代表要轉換的年份。

span.span: A two-digit or four-digit integer that represents the year to convert.

summary.span: 將指定的年份轉換為 4 位數年份，方法是使用 屬性以判斷適當的世紀。

span.span: Converts the specified year to a four-digit year by using the property to determine the appropriate century.

returns.span: 整數，包含 的四位數表示。

span.span: An integer that contains the four-digit representation of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是以兩位數年份表示時，該 100 年範圍中的最後一年。 is the last year in the 100-year range that can be represented by a two-digit year. 世紀所找到的唯一項目指定決定`year`該 100 年範圍內。The century is determined by finding the sole occurrence of the specified `year` within that 100-year range. 例如，如果設為 2029，100 年範圍是從 1930年到 2029年。For example, if is set to 2029, the 100-year range is from 1930 to 2029. 因此，30 的 2 位數值會解譯為 1930，而 2 位數為 29 值解譯為 2029年。Therefore, a 2-digit value of 30 is interpreted as 1930, while a 2-digit value of 29 is interpreted as 2029. 支援兩位數年份或四位數年份。 supports either a two-digit year or a four-digit year. 傳遞的兩位數年份值 (小於 100) 將使這個方法將值轉換為四位數的值根據值，表示該適當世紀。Passing a two-digit year value (less than 100) causes the method to convert the value to a four-digit value according to the value representing the appropriate century. 如果應用程式提供支援的行事曆範圍內的四位數年份值，方法會傳回實際的輸入的值。If the application supplies a four-digit year value that is within the supported calendar range to , the method returns the actual input value. 如果應用程式提供支援的行事曆範圍四位數值或它提供一個負數值，方法會擲回例外狀況。If the application supplies a four-digit value that is outside the supported calendar range, or if it supplies a negative value, the method throws an exception.

exception.span: 不在曆法支援的範圍內。

span.span: is outside the range supported by the calendar.

MemberSignature.Value: public override int TwoDigitYearMax { get; set; }
.property instance int32 TwoDigitYearMax
Public Overrides Property TwoDigitYearMax As Integer
public: virtual property int TwoDigitYearMax { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定以二位數年份表示時，該 100 年範圍的最後一年。

span.span: Gets or sets the last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.

value.span: 以二位數年份表示時，該 100 年範圍的最後一年。

span.span: The last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性允許 2 位數的年份的 4 位數年份正確轉譯。This property allows a 2-digit year to be properly translated to a 4-digit year. 例如，如果這個屬性設定為 2029年，100 年範圍是從 1930年到 2029年。For example, if this property is set to 2029, the 100-year range is from 1930 to 2029. 因此，30 的 2 位數值會解譯為 1930，而 2 位數為 29 值解譯為 2029年。Therefore, a 2-digit value of 30 is interpreted as 1930, while a 2-digit value of 29 is interpreted as 2029. 類別不會偵測系統設定中的變更。The class does not detect changes in the system settings. 應用程式可以設定此值為 99，表示就其字面 2 位數的年份。The application can set this value to 99 to indicate that 2-digit years are to be taken literally. 例如，這個屬性設定為 99，100 年範圍是從 0 （不是有效值大部分的行事曆） 到 99。For example, if this property is set to 99, the 100-year range is from 0 (not a valid value for most calendars) to 99. 因此，30 的 2 位數值會解譯為 30。Therefore, a 2-digit value of 30 is interpreted as 30.

exception.span: 在設定作業中指定的值小於 99。

span.span: The value specified in a set operation is less than 99.
-or-

exception.span: 在設定作業中指定的值大於 。

span.span: The value specified in a set operation is greater than .

exception.span: 在設定作業中，目前執行個體是唯讀的。

span.span: In a set operation, the current instance is read-only.
